text: Javier "Javi" Martínez Aginaga (born 2 September 1988) is a Spanish footballer. He plays as a defensive midfielder or a center-back for Bayern Munich. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Club Season League CupIncludes Copa del Rey, DFB-Pokal, Emir of Qatar Cup Continental Other
